meanings.definition: Something given for free, typically as a promotional item.
meanings.sent1: The store offered a freebie with every purchase.
meanings.sent2: I love getting freebies at events.
meanings.sent3: The freebie made the customers happy.
meanings.sent4: The freebie was like a little surprise in the package.
meanings.sent5: The freebie was so cool, everyone wanted one.

meanings.definition: To give something for free, typically as a promotion or gift.
meanings.sent1: The company decided to freebie the new product to attract customers.
meanings.sent2: She always freebies samples to her friends.
meanings.sent3: He freebied the extra cookies to the kids.
meanings.sent4: The company freebied their services to gain popularity.
meanings.sent5: They freebie products to increase brand awareness.
